sentences: Since 2006, Vishakha Hari has performed in several sabhas during the Chennai Music Season.
Smt Vishaka hari was awarded Dr. M.S. Subbulakshmi Centenary Award at a ceremony in Mumbai Sri Shamukhananda Fine Arts and Sangeetha Sabha on 13th ofSeptember 2016.
She is one amongst seven of India's most-respected women artistes.
On 20 November 2016, Bharitya Vidya Bhavan, Chennai decorated Smt Vishaka Hari with the  'Lifetime Achievement' award by the guest of the day Infosyschairman, R. Seshasayee.
